MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the WA10 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Hill School road, Prescot Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:17PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties accessing our equipment and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:45am on 6th December
